item.title: By: Stu Mac
item.dc:creator: Stu Mac
item.description: <p>£300k almost affordable - crikey mate you must earn too much!</p>
item.content:encoded: £300k almost affordable – crikey mate you must earn too much!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKD/$FILE/rolleyes.gif"</a>> Will be interested to hear what you think. (If you get a second bedroom be prepared for me to visit to see shows etc - if I can't get your Dad there I will have to start going alone!!)</p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKD/$FILE/rolleyes.gif“> Will be interested to hear what you think. (If you get a second bedroom be prepared for me to visit to see shows etc – if I can’t get your Dad there I will have to start going alone!!)
